tooltip.vortexmod.size_upgrade.tooltip: Increases the radius that is considered the TARDIS by 1 when input in a size manipulator module.
tooltip.vortexmod.euclidean_upgrade.tool: Right clicking on the interface with this will make your TARDIS bigger on the inside! All modules must be within 16 blocks of the interface in the TARDIS dimension.
tooltip.vortexmod.vortex_core.tooltip: A crafting item for the vortex mod.
tooltip.vortexmod.key.tooltip: An optional key to lock your non euclidean TARDIS.
tooltip.vortexmod.wrench.tooltip: Right clicking on the interface with this will drop the interface.
tooltip.vortexmod.throttle_block.tooltip: Starts/Stops the flight sequence when right clicked. Shift right click to toggle auto landing in the BOTI TARDIS.
tooltip.vortexmod.interface_block.toolti: Use the wrench to pick me up. Main block of the TARDIS, considered the heart and needed for any TARDIS. Outputs redstone signal during flight. Takes FE to run, see your FE with the monitor.
tooltip.vortexmod.coordinate_block.toolt: Control the target location using basic sliders.
tooltip.vortexmod.keypad_block.tooltip: Allows you to use most of /tardis. Also adds dimensional functionality to the TARDIS. This block also has a gui.
tooltip.vortexmod.size_manipulator_block: Module that allows you to input size upgrades. Must be touching the interface block.
tooltip.vortexmod.equalizer_block.toolti: Module that prevents the lightning from striking your landing zone.
tooltip.vortexmod.disruptor_block.toolti: Prevents any TARDIS not owned by the placer of the disruptor from landing in the same chunk as it.
tooltip.vortexmod.door_block.tooltip: Meant for the interior of a non euclidean TARDIS, leads to the outside world, you can place as many doors as you want inside the TARDIS dimension within 100 blocks of the interface. When entering the TARDIS, you will always end up at the closest door to the original entry position.
tooltip.vortexmod.scanner_block.tooltip: Meant of the interior of a non euclidean TARDIS, gives information about the outside world such as if there's ground below the exit point.
tooltip.vortexmod.grounding_block.toolti: Will ensure that you land on the ground if you were set to be in the air.
tooltip.vortexmod.biometric_module.toolt: Allows you to blacklist people from entering your TARDIS with commands. This is only functional in a non euclidean TARDIS. (Right click for tutorial).
tooltip.vortexmod.tardis_sign_block.tool: Just a decorative block for your interiors or anything really.
tooltip.vortexmod.size_designator.toolti: Used to precisely set the borders of your proto TARDIS. Each size upgrade is worth 128 blocks when using this. Use like a world edit wand, right click on the size manipulator to set.
tooltip.vortexmod.monitor_block.tooltip: Displays information about the exterior, target, and current flight. Right click to switch between exterior and target.
